title: Looking for TEAMMATES - Chill but motivated ;)
body:
Hey Guys,

my name is jokery456 and i'm looking for some chill people to play lol with.

Over the last years i played many champions and roles. But always had the most enjoyment when playing with people i know or at least played with a couple of times.
To chase a goal as a team is simply more fun, I guess.

So couple of minutes ago, i decided to look out for some people like me.
I don't wannt strict training session or stuff. i want a group of people i can improve with and try out new things from time to time.

I play League for more than 5 years now. And as im still in Silver, I'm sure i won't make it to the pro scene that soon.
At the moment I'm playing from 4-7 days a week, mostly afternoons and evenings as I'm working during day.
I'm above Leage age, but thats just a number.

What am I looking for?
- Be friendly
- Tolerant and open (0 tollerence when it comes to racism, sexism, hate speeches or anything like that)
- Speak Englisch
- Don't talk ALL the time. Im just not much a fan of constant nonsense talking. That's all :)
- Don't flame (too much). A little salt here and there is okay. but in generell we're all here to enjoy the game. and that is hard with the amount of flaming kids in our community.
- Help each other. Be open for criticism. Don't be a know-it-all - but critic helps you grow.
- Real life is always more important. 

I just wanna have fun :) Try new tactics. improve as a player and as a team. 
That would be awesome.
If you are interested, write a little something about your motivation. 
See you on the Rift - 
jokery 456

replies.body: Spaß und der Wille sich zu verbessern steht im Vordergrund. Stats können gemeinsam besser werden
